channel.title: Kylerscape compiler help
channel.description: I am using kylerscapes client and i get an error while trying to run so i guess it has to do within my compiler because the error is there too. The compiler says: [code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code] What parts should i edit to fix this?

item.title: Kylerscape compiler help
item.dc:creator: @bily123 bily123
item.description:
@bily123 wrote:

run the compiler, then read what it says
I ran it and it ran fine so im guessing that its not the compiler but the run file. So the run file says: [code]@ECHO OFF color 81 title Kylerscape echo Kylerscape Client echo Created by Kyler JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI[/code]

There may be another solution such as makeing the client this server accepts different. Kyler made the server only accept his client. Can i change that? If I can please tell me where i can locate it.

Read full topic

Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit
